verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Ananias, <S%G367><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Sapphira <S%G4551><s%> his <S%G848><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> a possession, <S%G2933><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> kept back <S%G3557><s%> part of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> price, <S%G5092><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> being privy <S%G4894><s%> to it, and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> it at <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles' <S%G652><s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Ananias, <S%G367><s%> why <S%G1302><s%> hath Satan <S%G4567><s%> filled <S%G4137><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to lie <S%G5574><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to keep back <S%G3557><s%> part of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> price <S%G5092><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> land? <S%G5564><s%>

While it remained, <S%G3306><s%> was it not thine own? <S%G3306><s%> <S%G3780><s%> <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> after it was sold, <S%G4097><s%> was <S%G5225><s%> it not in <S%G1722><s%> thine own <S%G4674><s%> power? <S%G1849><s%> <S%G3754><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> hast thou conceived <S%G5087><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing <S%G4229><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> heart? <S%G2588><s%> thou hast not <S%G3756><s%> lied <S%G5574><s%> unto men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> unto God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> fell down, <S%G4098><s%> and gave up the ghost: <S%G1634><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that heard <S%G191><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> young men <S%G3501><s%> arose, <S%G450><s%> wound him up, <S%G4958><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> carried him out, <S%G1627><s%> and buried <S%G2290><s%> him.

And <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the space <S%G1292><s%> of three <S%G5140><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> after, when <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> what was done, <S%G1096><s%> came in. <S%G1525><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> ye sold <S%G591><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> land <S%G5564><s%> for so much? <S%G5118><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> she <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> for so much. <S%G5118><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G5101><s%> is it that <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5213><s%> have agreed together <S%G4856><s%> to tempt <S%G3985><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord? <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> of them which have buried <S%G2290><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> husband <S%G435><s%> are at <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door, <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall carry thee out. <S%G1627><s%> <S%G4571><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> fell she down <S%G4098><s%> straightway <S%G3916><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yielded up the ghost: <S%G1634><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> young men <S%G3495><s%> came in, <S%G1525><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> her <S%G846><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> carrying her forth, <S%G1627><s%> buried <S%G2290><s%> her by <S%G4314><s%> her <S%G846><s%> husband. <S%G435><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> as many as <S%G3956><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> were many <S%G4183><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> wrought <S%G1096><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people; <S%G2992><s%> (and <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> all <S%G537><s%> with one accord <S%G3661><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Solomon's <S%G4672><s%> porch. <S%G4745><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> rest <S%G3062><s%> durst <S%G5111><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> join <S%G2853><s%> himself to them: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> magnified <S%G3170><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> believers <S%G4100><s%> were the more <S%G3123><s%> added <S%G4369><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> multitudes <S%G4128><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of men <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> women.) <S%G1135><s%>

Insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they brought forth <S%G1627><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sick <S%G772><s%> into <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> streets, <S%G4113><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> them on <S%G1909><s%> beds <S%G2825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> couches, <S%G2895><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> at the least <S%G2579><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of Peter <S%G4074><s%> passing by <S%G2064><s%> might overshadow <S%G1982><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> There came <S%G4905><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> out of the <S%G3588><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%> round about <S%G4038><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> sick folks, <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them which were vexed <S%G3791><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits: <S%G4151><s%> and they <S%G3748><s%> were healed <S%G2323><s%> every one. <S%G537><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> rose up, <S%G450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that were with <S%G4862><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> (which is <S%G5607><s%> the sect <S%G139><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Sadducees,) <S%G4523><s%> and were filled <S%G4130><s%> with indignation, <S%G2205><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> them <S%G848><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the common <S%G1219><s%> prison. <S%G5084><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%> doors, <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> brought them forth, <S%G1806><s%> <S%G846><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%>

Go, <S%G4198><s%> <S%G2532><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> and speak <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G2411><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that, they entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G2411><s%> early in the morning, <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3722><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taught. <S%G1321><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> came, <S%G3854><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that were with <S%G4862><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and called the council together, <S%G4779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4892><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> senate <S%G1087><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prison <S%G1201><s%> to have them <S%G846><s%> brought. <S%G71><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> came, <S%G3854><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> they <S%G1161><s%> returned, <S%G390><s%> and told, <S%G518><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> prison <S%G1201><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> we shut <S%G2808><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> safety, <S%G803><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> keepers <S%G5441><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> doors: <S%G2374><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> when we had opened, <S%G455><s%> we found <S%G2147><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> within. <S%G2080><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3739><s%> high priest <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> captain <S%G4755><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> things, <S%G3056><s%> they doubted <S%G1280><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%> whereunto <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> would grow. <S%G1096><s%> <S%G302><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> men <S%G435><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye put <S%G5087><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> went <S%G565><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> captain <S%G4755><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> officers, <S%G5257><s%> and brought <S%G71><s%> them <S%G846><s%> without <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3756><s%> violence: <S%G970><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> they should have been stoned. <S%G3034><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had brought <S%G71><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> they set <S%G2476><s%> them before <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> council: <S%G4892><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Did not <S%G3756><s%> we straitly command <S%G3853><s%> <S%G3852><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that ye should not <S%G3361><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> name? <S%G3686><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> ye have filled <S%G4137><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> with your <S%G5216><s%> doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> intend <S%G1014><s%> to bring <S%G1863><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other apostles <S%G652><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> We ought <S%G1163><s%> to obey <S%G3980><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> raised up <S%G1453><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> slew <S%G1315><s%> and hanged <S%G2910><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a tree. <S%G3586><s%>

Him <S%G5126><s%> hath God <S%G2316><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> with his <S%G848><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> to be a Prince <S%G747><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a Savior, <S%G4990><s%> for to give <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things; <S%G4487><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> so is also <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> to them that obey <S%G3980><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
When <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that, they were cut <S%G1282><s%> to the heart, and <S%G2532><s%> took counsel <S%G1011><s%> to slay <S%G337><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> stood there up <S%G450><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> council, <S%G4892><s%> a Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Gamaliel, <S%G1059><s%> a doctor of the law, <S%G3547><s%> had in reputation <S%G5093><s%> among all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> and commanded <S%G2753><s%> to put <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> a little space; <S%G1024><s%> <S%G5100><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> Ye men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> take heed <S%G4337><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye intend <S%G3195><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> as touching <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G5125><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%> Theudas, <S%G2333><s%> boasting <S%G3004><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> somebody; <S%G5100><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> a number <S%G706><s%> of men, <S%G435><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> four hundred, <S%G5071><s%> joined <S%G4347><s%> themselves: who <S%G3739><s%> was slain; <S%G337><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> obeyed <S%G3982><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> were scattered, <S%G1262><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> naught. <S%G3762><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this man <S%G5126><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> of Galilee <S%G1057><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> taxing, <S%G582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drew away <S%G868><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him: <S%G848><s%> he also <S%G2548><s%> perished; <S%G622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> even as many as <S%G3745><s%> obeyed <S%G3982><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> were dispersed. <S%G1287><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3569><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> Refrain <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let them alone: <S%G1439><s%> <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> counsel <S%G1012><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> it will come to nought: <S%G2647><s%>
